original_text: These men travelled everywhere in Judah to teach people. They took with them the book which was a copy of the Lord's law. They used it to teach people in all Judah's towns.
korean_text: 그들이 여호와의 율법책을 가지고 유다에서 가르치되 그 모든 유다 성읍들로 두루 다니며 백성들을 가르쳤더라

sentences.original_text: These men travelled everywhere in Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들은 유다 온 땅으로 여행하며

sentences.original_text: They took with them the book
which was a copy of the Lord's law
They used it to teach people
